original_title: The House of the Seven Gables
overview: In 1828, the bankrupt Pyncheon family fight over Seven Gables, the ancestral mansion. To obtain the house, Jaffrey Pyncheon obtains his brother Clifford's false conviction for murder. Hepzibah, Clifford's sweet fianc√©e, patiently waits twenty years for his release, whereupon Clifford and his former cellmate, abolitionist Matthew, have a certain scheme in mind.
tagline: AN ANCIENT HOUSE! A MURDER SECRET! A HIDDEN TREASURE!
title: The House of the Seven Gables
